nodes.text: You look a little confused. My name’s Jenny; can I help you? perdy Enny
Well, that was different. I hope you come back; I think I’d like to experiment with some ideas  of my own next time.
Hmm, I think you just better clear out of here before Big Nose Sally finds you. She doesn’t take kindly to idjits in her place.

I don’t rightly know where Vic is. I know he has a house just down the street from us, to the east. He could be out trading with tribals or even in the Den, for all I know. I hope he’s okay. He was getting to be more than just a steady customer to me.
You're different from the usual group around here.
Hello there, cute stuff. My name's Jenny. You looking for work here? If you move as good as you look, you could really make some good money here.
Hello there, miss. My name's Jenny. Can I help you?
Hello there, mister. My name's Jenny. Looking for a good scrub-down?

The Den is a hive of scum and villainy southeast of here. I guess about a week or so? Don’t remember too clearly. Anyhow, it’s an exciting place. Dangerous, but exciting. Sorry to leave there,  in a way.
That sure was fun. You could be a real knockout if we got you out of those tribal duds. I wouldn’t mind having you stick around for a while, sister. Ever considered a career change?
You really have a lot of staying power. That’s the nice thing about younger men. Sure wish there were more like you in town.
A Geck? What’s that? Some kind of small gecko, I’d guess. Sorry, I don’t know what else it  would be.
You look a little confused. My name’s Jenny; can I help you? (nods) Hep
Gee, mister, that was pretty quick. You must be pretty new at this sort of thing. Just relax a bit and you’ll enjoy it more.
Vault-tek? He might have had something like that. I’m not sure. I know he did have a lot of  really old stuff.
Well, it’s been nice chattin’ with you. I better get ready for another customer, though. Goodbye.
What would you like to know?

Well, there’s not much to tell about the trappers, really. They get a few gecko pelts...or get lucky with a few golden geckos...and then they come in to blow off some steam. Quick and not too demanding —- just the way I like ‘em.
That was nice. You seem like you know your way around a woman better than most men your age.
Well then, you better talk to Big Nose Sally. She makes all the business arrangements for us and she doesn’t take kindly to any freelance work.

You’re interested in traders, huh? Well I mostly just worked for one trader. Vic was his name. He always had extra money to blow, at least when he worked he did. See, he specialized in really old stuff. You know,  technical thingies.

Vic was a real sweetheart. He would go off for weeks at a time and then come back with all kinds of beforetime things. But he often had to travel to the Den to sell them. Not much call for that sort of stuff ‘round here.

links.text: Enny? Goo heh heh heh. (smile)
It’s nice being with someone who understands what I need for a change.
I hope he comes back to you. I think I’ll go now. Goodbye.
I hope he’s okay, for your sake. Let me ask you another question.
I don’t think I want to know about what goes on here.
Tell me about what goes on here.
Mmm, I’d love to show you, personally, just how good I can move.
I’m really not interested in a job here.
I’m looking for information about a trader. He deals in beforetime things.
Thanks, but I think I just need to ask you some questions.
Actually, I could pick up some personal beauty tips from a cutie like you.
Uh, no; I just wanted to see what was in here. But I think I better go.
I’m looking for information about a certain trader of beforetime stuff.
I just had a few questions that I wanted to ask you.
Well, actually, I just had a few questions that I wanted to ask you if you don’t mind.
Actually, I could use a bit of a rub (nudge, nudge, wink, wink).
Uh, no thanks; I was just looking around.
I’m looking for information about a trader of beforetime stuff.
I think I’ll leave now, thanks.
Let me ask you something else.
I enjoyed myself, too. I have a lot of things to do before I could consider settling down just  yet. But, thanks anyway.
I sure enjoyed that bath, Jenny. I could go for a little more if I didn’t have other things  that I had to do.
Well, I guess that’s all I need for now.
Thanks, Jenny. Let me ask you something else.
Enny? Goo heh heh heh. (smile)
Thanks, Jenny; I guess I need some more practice at this.
Well I guess that’s all I need for now.
Thanks, Jenny. Let me ask you something else.
Bye.
Jenny, have you ever heard of something called a GECK?
Tell me about trappers.
Do you happen to know how to get to the Den from here?
I guess that’s all I need to know for now.
I’m looking for a trader. Know any of them that deal in old items, like from the beforetimes?
I guess that’s all I need to know for now.
Interesting; let me ask you about something else.
I’m glad that you had as much fun as I did.
Well, thanks for the info. I think I’ll go now.
Let me ask you about something else.
Tell me more about Vic.
Tell me something else.
Did Vic ever have anything that was labeled ‘Vault-Tek’?
Where’s Vic now?
Where’s the Den?
I think that’s all I need to know.
